oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Untersuchungen zur natürlichen Resistenz verschiedener Dinkelsorten gegen Zwergsteinbrand
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Huss, Herbert
Bürstmayr, Hermann
Gahleitner, August
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In inoculated field trials with dwarf bunt (Tilletia controversa) spelt wheat cultivars appeared more resistant than bread wheat cultivars. Among 10 spelt wheat cultivars, Tauro showed the lowest infection rates. Early sowing of spelt wheat in the field resulted in significantly reduced dwarf bunt severity compared to normal sowing times.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Huss, Herbert; Bürstmayr, Hermann and Gahleitner, August (2013) Untersuchungen zur natürlichen Resistenz verschiedener Dinkelsorten gegen Zwergsteinbrand. Paper at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
